overview: Continuing the cutting edge tales of feminist-horror from the original “Built to Kill”, this amped-up epic sequel pushes even more philosophical boundaries in the realm of horror, gore, comedy, action, and thrills, courtesy of leading independent filmmakers from France, Canada, and the USA, includes “No More God in Doctor”, “Those Who Can Die”, and “Nuke Them All”. Put together by Canada’s Darkside Releasing and Citizen 11, this high-octane women-in-horror anthology features award-winning international genre filmmakers.
title: Built 2 Kill
